name: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Marvin S. DAVIDSON.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Marvin S. DAVIDSON.
casebody.head_matter:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Marvin S. DAVIDSON.
No. D-2948.
Supreme Court of the United States
Feb. 21, 2017.
Marvin S. Davidson, of West Orange, New Jersey, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
